resources.string: Govt. Polytechnic College was established in 1988, under the World Bank Projects of Govt. of India . The Institute is managed by Govt. of M.P. , In the last 31 years , the Institute has successfully scaled new heights of achievements in the field of technical education and has earned the reputation of being one of the top ranking polytechnic in Madhya Pradesh. The Institute is located in the Northern side of the Betul at N.H -69(Nagpur-Itarsi ) highway on a spacious 25 acres with green valley of Sonaghati. To work for the development of appropriate technologies for the rural Upliftments.

The campus comprises of - 1) Main Building 2) Boys Hostel (Double storied 72 seats) 3) Staff quarters 4) Girls Hostel Double storied . Objectives of the Institute - 1. To offer Diploma courses in conventional disciplines of Engineering. 2. To work for the development of appropriate technologies for the rural Upliftments. 3. To organize socially useful courses.
Near N.H -69(Nagpur-Itarsi ) highway Betul Madhya Pradesh
Computer Science & Engineering Branch is starting year 1990 .at present in take sheet in 1st year 60 students a.CSE is best opportunity branch.

" Programming is about managing complexity: the complexity of the problem,laid upon the complexity of the machine. Because of this complexity, most of our programming projects fail."
"Get the right people. Then no matter what all else you might do wrong after that, the people will save you. That’s what management is all about."

string.name: sirline
string.b: " Good thoughts precede great Deeds. Great deeds Success. Hava a great day ."

resources.string: "Individual commitment to a group effort-that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.From the begning ,our mission has been to organize the worlds informnation and makenit universaly accessible and useful. Today people around the world turns to Search to find information learn about topics of interest and make important decision. We consider it is previlege to be able to help As Technology continues to evolve our Commitment will always be the same helping everyone find the information they need."
